website_summaries.verdict: If you've ever lamented the stark shine of standard cool-white, blue-tinged LEDS, you'll love the more traditional glow of these warm, white LED strips.
pros: Provides both bright light and low-power use
Roll measures more than 16 feet long
cons: Requires a 12V power adapter, which is not included
Colors may vary from box to box

customer_reviews.title: The lighting works pretty well, the connectors are handy
customer_reviews.text: The lighting works pretty well, the connectors are handy, and the double sided sticky tape works okay (although it doesn't stick to freshly painted walls for very long). My main complaint is that the color is not consistent across reels. I've purchased 3 reels (1 as a tester, and then 2 more). Of the second two one matches the first reel, and the other is way more yellow (the packaging was all marked as warm white, none were marked as yellow). See the attached picture of our pantry, the 3rd shelf down is definitely a different color. I'm ordering a 4th reel and hoping it is closer to the original two.
customer_reviews.author: citywok

customer_reviews.title: This is an awesome string of lights!
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe how bright these are for their tiny size. I used a strip of them for my son's room to backlight a picture (and double as a night light). I ended up cutting that back to about 1/3 the amount I used initially as it was too bright for sleeping. Cutting them is very easy as well. I put the rest of them in the kitchen under the cabinets for an inexpensive solution to under-cabinet lighting. Make sure you order a power supply to go with them. I am ordering another set to backlight one of my televisions. For the price, I don't think you can beat these.
customer_reviews.author: jjmcd97

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT ORDER WARM WHITE LED'S FROM THESE GUYS!
customer_reviews.text: absolute garbage. i ordered TWO rolls of this, both specified as 'WARM WHITE'. one waterproof for outside, one non waterproof for inside. BOTH were not even CLOSE to warm white. they both have a sickly greenish-white flourescent glow, not even a little 'warm'. Everything in the packages said 'warm white'. this company has zero QC and i will never buy LED's from them again. throwing these in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Hugh Jass

customer_reviews.title: and later discovered that it's not quite that easy. The key is the connectors
customer_reviews.text: This was the first time I installed light strips. I watched a couple videos, and later discovered that it's not quite that easy. The key is the connectors. This 2-pack of light strips was great. No complaints about this product. The LE strip was very durable. It survived folding and getting stepped on. I did under cabinet in the kitchen. Advice: clean the surface with alcohol. The attached picture shows a single strip under each cabinet. And an extra 2 strips over the stove and sink. Plenty of light. I used a total of 24 feet. (The old light above the stove is there, but turned off. The new tile was not installed yet.)
customer_reviews.author: R. Veldman

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely amazing
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. I revived my cabinets by wiring this into a dimmer switch. For dimming and converting the 120v to 12v  For connecting LED strip  For soldering the strip together (don't be afraid to learn this!) cheap, easy, and fun!  Learn to solder:  wire cutters:  Also, you'll need your favorite drill for drilling holes through cabinet, and a staple gun is great for securing the wire/strip throughout. Have fun!
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Nice warm white light
customer_reviews.text: These non-waterproof warm whites worked great. The color was what I was expecting. I used these strings inside kitchen cabinets and around a fireplace. Pros: LE lights come with extra ends. If you are using 2.1m barrel connectors or joining pieces you have this is very handy. They have a nice finish The brightness is what you expect for this LED type The contacts at the cut are sufficient to use quick connectors I have about 6 of their strings in service and I have no issues with adhesion to different types of pre-cleaned surfaces (wood, plastic and metal) Cons: Sometimes the cut lines are not printed centered on the contacts... cut the center, not an off-center line.
customer_reviews.author: Always Tinkering

customer_reviews.title: Does not come ready to use, needs adapter
customer_reviews.text: It doesnt come with the adapter you need to plug it in, that has to be bought separately and the description does NOT tell you this. Paid 8.99 for lights I cant even use, but unless you have a UPS store close to you, it's going to cost 5.99 just to return them. Very disappointed in this product
customer_reviews.author: Jammie Davis

customer_reviews.title: Not the color advertised.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 reels of the warm white LEDs. I received one warm white (that looked like the picture) and one noticeable different (that looked like the daylight picture). Both boxes indicated warm white (4100057-WW), but the warm white had a 120 ohm series resistor and the daylight had a 130 ohm resistor. Long story short—I had an additional reel ordered to make sure it arrived for the install, and got a replacement via amazon, and a coworker ordered one for personal use. All were supposed to be warm white. All and all 4 out of 5 were not the color advertised. Customer and installer, not happy.
customer_reviews.author: Zinny

customer_reviews.title: good lights
customer_reviews.text: This LED light strip was easy to install. The preinstalled adhesive does not work the best on an unfinished sanded pine board so I followed up with some wire staples to make sure it stayed in place. The yellowish tint of the warm white lights paired well with unpainted pine boards to create a silhouette shadow box. I did not need the whole length but it was easy to cut to length and clearly marked where to cut. I have not yet tried to use the leftover portion.
customer_reviews.author: FixerDelta

customer_reviews.title: easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to cut every inch and a half with scissors. Then, with the appropriate connectors, its easy to connect them together. These a a bit more expensive than the Ikea ones. But the Ikea ones are not easy to connect back together, and you are only able to cut them every 12-14 inches. In my opinion the one down side is the AC adapter you have to purchase separately.... although it works well, its very bulky.
customer_reviews.author: BMSX

customer_reviews.title: Lights up family room perfectly.
customer_reviews.text: I used these for indirect lighting above open beams in family room. I actually had them for about 9 months before installing so I was worried about the adhesive going bad, it that was not a problem. Four strips out of two rolls so about 32 ft light up my family room with vaulted ceiling way better than the old type. All that and only 36 watts! Was replacing old incandescent accent lighting strips, so had to splice into the existing wiring. I was able to use and old power supply I had on hand and bought a PWM slide dimmer that fits right in to a standard single gang with decors faceplate. Works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: JUSTANI

customer_reviews.title: Good product, good pr
customer_reviews.text: Good solid product. I’ve installed these in over a dozen homes and have only had a issue with one (which was a issue with the install not the light). As for the adhesive, depending on the surface it is going on (wood vs metal vs glass) it must be clean with something that won’t leave a residue. If it’s going right on wood I put a small bead of clear silicone chaulk. Hope this is helpful.
customer_reviews.author: richard goethals

customer_reviews.title: Worked about 24 hours then the connection at LED strip went Bad
customer_reviews.text: Bad Quality workmanship. Joints at went bad within 24 hours of use after it was permanently mounted. Bad joint where power plug in goes . Right from that end where it starts. Moving that joint lights flicker but do not stay on. its the joining area where LED starts, that is made defective. Seller should replace bad items for the buyers. Or give a Refund.
customer_reviews.author: R. K

customer_reviews.title: ... product with an adapter included and putting that in fine print is a sleazy tactic to overcharge people who ...
customer_reviews.text: Not selling the product with an adapter included and putting that in fine print is a sleazy tactic to overcharge people who are then forced to order the charger separate for a higher price. Put "LE Flexible LED Strip w/o adapter" in the title instead of all the other product details you have in the title as distractors. I cannot leave a good review for this reason.
customer_reviews.author: Greco

customer_reviews.title: Very bright and easy to work with
customer_reviews.text: I built a cocktail style arcade cabinet and wanted to find a lighting solution for the control panels. There wasn't a lot of room left inside the cabinet for standard light bulbs because of the thick monitor bezel. I tapped into a 12V lead from a power supply and used the included connectors. Two rows of these lights behind a white sheet of plexi did the trick. It's almost too bright! The color temperature is a nice warm color, which is perfect for that incandescent kind of look.
customer_reviews.author: David T. Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect color LEDs for my white cabinets
customer_reviews.text: I put these under my kitchen cabinets to light up the counters and I love them. I struggled whether to buy the bright white lights or these warmer 3000K lights. I have white cabinets and was worried that these would appear too yellow, but I also didn't want the kitchen to look to sterile with bright white LEDs. After looking at several pics I went with these 3000K warm lights and am very happy how the color looks with my white cabinets. Not too yellow and not too sterile for my kitchen - just right.
customer_reviews.author: Steve D

customer_reviews.title: Simple, very low profile, GREAT adhesive.
customer_reviews.text: I used 3 of these to light the inside of a 12 x 16 ft livestock shelter. Very unobtrusive and easy installation. Surprisingly decent light. The strips come with plain wire on one end, so you do not need to use the plug/adapter end. (Mine are wired into a 12v circuit of a batter/solar setup.) The adhesive is pretty amazing. I installed these onto rough 2x4s in 30 degree weather, thinking I would need to staple them up, but the adhesive is holding 100%. And I was able to snake these around a couple 90-degree corners, etc., with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey B. Fiedler

customer_reviews.title: Very bright, very sticky, but slightly more "daylight white" than what is shown in the product photo
customer_reviews.text: Very bright! Easy to install. I found the tape backing to be very sticky and only a very minor amount of pressure was needed to get the light strip to stick underneath the kitchen cabinets. One small criticism... the lights are more on the "white" side than "warm" side. Definitely more of a daylight white than what the product picture depicts. The package said "WW" which means warm-white, I think, but I almost thought I bought the daylight white by mistake. Still, a slightly warm color which is acceptable...just not quite a warm as I hoped.
customer_reviews.author: D Goodwin

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price, but not perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is a great price for a warm white LED strip. Two complaints take away a star. For one, the packaging says that the LEDs aren't dimmable... Which is as true for these LEDs as any other, which is false. All LEDs, including these, can be dimmed issuing PWM. Just use a microcontroller and an N-channel power MOSFET. Second issue: I thought one of the LEDs was bad. It wasn't. It was backwards. Reverse the polarity on the strip and that LED came on. For 1 in 5 meters of strip, I guess that's not bad, but I can't give 5 stars after seeing that.
customer_reviews.author: Lampshade

customer_reviews.title: Well priced decent quality LED light tape - good semi warm color
customer_reviews.text: I bought the whiter version of this product and it clashed with my installed LED lighting, so I went with this product for above cabinet lighting. I had no defects and all LEDs worked great. Worked well with a dimmer controlled 80 watt driver. Also worked well with LED connectors. I was loooking at much more expensive options and am very pleased to have gotten this tape light in terms of quality and price.
customer_reviews.author: Mixed Desmid

customer_reviews.title: defiantly better than LEDwhoseller
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 4 LED strips from another Amazon seller "LEDwholeseller" and I had too many problems with that seller. It either comes used, missing parts, or totally different product. This seller comes exactly how you see it in the picture. This seller even provides an extra plug for you so that you can re-use the unused portion of the original roll. Shipping was fast and packaging was good as normal. I recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: jon

customer_reviews.title: they installed easily and look great
customer_reviews.text: Just put these under my kitchen cabinets. After we got the hang of it, they installed easily and look great! Just remember to clean the area you will be sticking these to so that the adhesive doesn't let go. I used rubbing alcohol. I also used a few staples, making sure that the staples went completely over the strip. (staples were wider than strip). I like them so much I may install some on top of my cabinets too. I hope to add a dimmer switch to my light switch after they are all installed.
customer_reviews.author: Stludwig

customer_reviews.title: Actual colors vary for the same lights
customer_reviews.text: The product itself works fine and fit our needs, the problem is that we bought 3 strips of the same color and they were not the same. One was the soft white we expected and another was a dull white with a hint of green. I've seen other reviews with the same problem. It would be one thing to send the incorrect color (blue/red/purple/etc) but this was packaged in the correct box suggesting that the lights themselves are either faulty or not manufactured the same way. Re-ordering now becomes a problem if i don't know the replacements are going to be correct.
customer_reviews.author: Pebr

customer_reviews.title: Love these.
customer_reviews.text: I used this to light over and under kitchen cabinets. I soldered everything so I can't say whether or not the included clips work well. The adhesive is quality 3M transfer tape so you don't have to worry about it falling off over time. Use an LED driver if you want them to last.
customer_reviews.author: Dale Alan

customer_reviews.title: Wow supper lights
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these to bring light to my kitchen counters. With black granite counter tops everything seemed to disappear and the kitchen was dark. I also purchased wire, and all necessary patch connectors and spliters to complete the installation, and even the remote. After installing the under cabinet lights I was so impressed that I installed another set over the cabinets for purely decorative purposes. I love the new look and the ability to better see what I am doing on my counters. Oh yeah I can even find my Kindle and black phone now when I lay them on the counter.
customer_reviews.author: David Andrews

customer_reviews.title: Fun to mess around with. Good value.
customer_reviews.text: Used in a curio cabinet. Work great but too bright at 12v. Using a 9v 1amp power supply and still very bright. Added a resister to drop the voltage down to 6v and getting a nice glow. Double-sided 3M tape won't last. It was already coming off the led strip side. Plan on using glue or something mechanical. Soldered sections together using some old phone wire. Copper pads easy to solder to with a fine tip iron.
customer_reviews.author: Dwayne

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great inexpensive light source for side projects. I bought these lights for a wooden vanity mirror and couldn't be happier. Lighting is bright and very natural for LED. Adhesive works very well but will leave residue if you remove (haven't tested on other surfaces). **Make sure you purchase the proper power adapter and accessories as they are not included. ** Pros: -Bright -Easy to adhere -Manageable around corners -Almost not heat output Cons: -Wish the power cord was slightly longer - Adhesive will leave a slight residue on wood surface if let to sit and removed -Not aesthetically pleasant to look at
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Schmid

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, bright lights
customer_reviews.text: These lights are excellent and for the price you can't go wrong. They are very bright so keep that in mind depending on what you are using them for. I'm using that basically as night light for our deer shack and will only need about 6 inches from the strip to keep things bright enough. These would be perfect for under cabinets or even in your boat or fish house. I also purchased a set of on/off switches and some 20ga wire that I'll run to a 12v battery for power. Oh and don't forget, with the two sided tape, installation is a breeze!
customer_reviews.author: Greg Sliter

customer_reviews.title: Professional loves this system.
customer_reviews.text: Our company started using ribbon-LED systems about a year ago. We have installed them under cabinets, in china hutches, over crown molding, and more! They go anywhere! ( Mind your heat dissipation rules). They do require a transformer (mind dimming capabilities of the transformer) and little couplings to join pieces, but this LE brand is the easiest to install, has good adhesive and good-color light. My customers love the effect!
customer_reviews.author: Anna Amp

customer_reviews.title: Great for lighting closet space.
customer_reviews.text: I used a single strip to put inside a closet with no light (but had a plug). Length was perfect to outline the doorway inside the closet. I added the LE Mini Remove Controller and LE Power Adapter to set it up. Works great and lights up the closet. Also, because it's inside the doorway, facing the clothes, instead of on the ceiling facing down, it doesn't shoot a beam of light out of the closet and wake up others in the early morning. I only got one strand, so I didn't have to deal with the color match issue that other reviewers mentioned.
customer_reviews.author: D. Green

customer_reviews.title: Eh no. Pick another
customer_reviews.text: Garbage and returning it. It takes DYI project into overload. I also wouldn't trust it any where I did not frequently check. Seems very cheaply made. I'm not plugging this into electric in my house.
customer_reviews.author: J. C. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Bright, but not overwhelming
customer_reviews.text: I used these for DIY under cabinet lighting in my kitchen, and they're nice. Though I thought I bought waterproof ones and these are not as far as I can tell, but that's fine for me because they're not going to get wet where I've put them. Would like to know if they're dim-able, but for now they're fine as-is. I have and would recommend, for sure!
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Use any 12vdc adapter with standard 12v plug. Or cut and splice wires if plug doesnt fit. Can cut the light strip in half and use the bare wires at the other end to power the 2nd set of lights.
customer_reviews.author: Mike I

customer_reviews.title: Strips work 100% out of the box and are great for many uses
customer_reviews.text: Strips work 100% out of the box and are great for many uses. You can use the whole string or cut every 3 leds for all kinds of creative things. I used these 3000k temps to light the bottom and middle of my cabinets/floors and also made some lighted mason jars to hang as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Alexander II

customer_reviews.title: Really a very fine color, better than hoped!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this string of warm white led lights for under-cabinet illumination. I used spots of hot melt glue to help hold it as the cabinets are 65+ years old so the adhesive might need a bit of help. I am VERY PLEASED with the illumination and quality of the light these give. I don't care much for the harshness of the blue-white LEDs and was concerned that these would be too similar, but they are much better than hoped. So much so I've purchased another couple strings for in-closet lighting.
customer_reviews.author: Steven J

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product - Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I was a little bit concerned with this because I had to combine other componets like power supply and RF remote, but my worry was unwarranted. I used these for over cabinet lighting, and they were perfect. I am using an RF remote for dimming. I think the 3000K temperature is accurate as it matches the temperature of the under cabinet lighting. These are smaller and lighter than I expected and for my application that was just fine. I would order these again.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: These lights are awesome and easy to work with
customer_reviews.text: This is probably my 5th purchase of these lights. I install them into every kitchen remodel I do now... These lights are awesome and easy to work with.. Add a ton of value to my projects. Be sure to get the polarity (+\-) correct. On My first few installs I thought the LEDs were shorting out or otherwise defective. Nope, user error. Fantastic buy!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DOESN'T INCLUDE A POWER STRIP OR SWITCH!!
customer_reviews.text: I have bought many other light strips like this off Amazon for the same price that included a power strip and switch. This one is just a light strip with two wires hanging out the end. Useless!
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Burris

customer_reviews.title: Great value!!!! I have nothing bad to say about them.
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic! The adhesion was quiet strong. I need to reinforce them a little with a few Staples in corner areas, but that's only because I stuck them on a carpet like material. If you're sticking them to a flat surface, there would be zero chance of them coming off. Nice and bright! But not blinding.
customer_reviews.author: A.J

customer_reviews.title: wow!
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic! They are a pretty warm color and look amazing under my windowsill in my bedroom. They're gorgeous, definitely buy these! ' Edited to add: I wanted to add this for anyone like me who used it not under anything but in plain sight where the ceiling meets the wall; they work great! They are very bright, but not "too much" like I was afraid of. You also can't see the strip with the lights on and they blend in with a white wall that high up. When lit, they look like a string of pretty pearls of lights. Very, very elegant and nice.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: These things are amazing
customer_reviews.text: This arrived quickly and was well packed. One end has a connector attached and the other end has 2 wires about 6" long. I mounted this in the living room of a 1971 Avion trailer I am renovating and connected the 2 wires to a remote control dimmer from Lighting Ever and presto everything works like magic. I reversed the polarity the first time I connected them but did no damage. They have a 3M sticky tape on the back for easy mounting. The full strip uses 12.3 watts as measured with a power analyser and is about as bright as 4 or 5 standard 1156 bulbs. The lights have a green tint that I did not find objectionable.
customer_reviews.author: Terrence M. Pullen

customer_reviews.title: Last forever
customer_reviews.text: These lights are the besssttt!!!!! I used them behind my bed headboard & also underneath kitchen cabinets & let me tell you. They last forever. My husband and I never turn them off & they have yet to die. The light it gives off is super beautiful! Amazing quality for The price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to install, lovely warm color temperature
customer_reviews.text: I installed these in a crawl space, behind our pantry. Installation took literally 10 minutes, including stapling the power cord to the wall. The adhesive-backed lights stuck to an unpainted drywall surface, with no extra surface prep. I used them at their full length. Transformer was plug-and-play, just as advertised. I'm going to buy more to light the lower area of our closets. A little bit of excellence in a world of mediocrity!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew J. Glerum

customer_reviews.title: No power supply, but good LEDs
customer_reviews.text: Make sure you pick up a power supply (sold separately) but otherwise this is a decent set of LED lights. The color is good and they're plenty bright of the pantry I put them in. Smaller than I expected but this ended up being a good thing and the back tape is decently sticky. Removing a star for the lack of a power supply but as long as you order one with this strip it's a decent set.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Fehnel

customer_reviews.title: They are well made and easy to install and come with everything you need to ...
customer_reviews.text: I put these up as accent lighting above my bar hidden behind a light rail.They are well made and easy to install and come with everything you need to install except a power supply. However - these have a weird green tint to them that I don't like. I have them on a PWM dimmer and it does not matter the brightness - they have a green tone that is especially apparent if they are next to any incandescent or "soft white" CFL or LED lamps. It makes my wood backsplash look really strange. Im going to take them down and install some regular LED light bars.
customer_reviews.author: F. Rizzo

customer_reviews.title: Colors are not uniform from box to box
customer_reviews.text: I bought 4 boxes, and used one box per display cabinet and one box doesn’t match the rest in uniform color.. see picture.. all 4 boxes are warm white non waterproof. Not too happy..
customer_reviews.author: JDH

customer_reviews.title: My only complaint is that the "warm light" is more green than warm.
customer_reviews.text: My only complaint is that the "warm light" is more green than warm. The spectrum really is not the same as an incandescent bulb. So if you are looking for soft warm, mood lighting i'm not sure if i wold recommend this, instead of 3000k you might have to get something that's around 2700k. But it works well as a task light. i used it for under cabinet lighting in my kitchen. the lights them-self are of course easy to install, that is if you can figure out how to get all your wiring ran.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value and fantastic lighting source for boat.
customer_reviews.text: For under $10 these led lights are phenomenal. I used these as an ambient lighting source on my open bow boat for low light or night cruising. Not wanting something extremely bright I choose the warm white. I installed these under the drivers and passenger dash, side pockets, engine bay under the sun deck and in the front storage wells. The adhesive strip is pretty good and so far has held up nicely, I did purchase adhesive silicone and heady duty foam adhesive just in case but found that I did not need it. Having 16ft allowed me to run these in several areas the most convenient so far being the engine bay.
customer_reviews.author: Scott B.

customer_reviews.title: Great! I put a row under the kitchen cabinets ...
customer_reviews.text: Great! I put a row under the kitchen cabinets and wired it into the light over the sink for a little more ambient lighting in the evening. It's really bright though; you can easily do things like get more food or pour a drink or wash up under that illumination without turning on the main lights. It's actually almost too bright. I agree with some other comments that one row might not be enough for "task lighting" but two would DEFINITELY be enough. And one is enough for simple things like maybe cutting an apple or something.
customer_reviews.author: JaimeZX

customer_reviews.title: Brigth white LEDs
customer_reviews.text: Barely got these out and put them up under the frame of a bed for accent lightening. They are easy to hook up to the adapter and priced okay for what you get, an extra adaptor cord that goes into the converter and 2 little connectors. My only problem is that the adhesive on the back didn't stick well to the metal frame. Wish the adhesive was "stickier' if that is a word. Oh and these are bright white. Overall great little lights and makes for a fun project.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Work's perfectly.
customer_reviews.text: Led strip lights with 3M tape worked perfectly. Used in motorhome counter top edges were the original lights were starting to die. Wired right up to existing 12V wires.
customer_reviews.author: R D

customer_reviews.title: Work great
customer_reviews.text: I do not know how to really critique LED strip lights, but they seem to work fine and pretty bright. For indoor use, I would restrict these to task lighting scenarios. I think they are too bright for just adding a "glow" to bookcases or something similar.
customer_reviews.author: Brian P Catt

customer_reviews.title: If you want to try your hand at wiring
customer_reviews.text: May have been amazing, but they don’t have a power source and there’s not suggestion for which one you need and I’m not an engineer man, I’m just trying to soak some lights up
customer_reviews.author: Selina D. Harvey

customer_reviews.title: Good product, good price.
customer_reviews.text: These are good little lights, I like the color. The connectors don't work that well for me, but I'm soldering them together so it doesnt's make a difference to me. I'm giving this 4 stars instead of 5 because until you turn them on, there is no way to distinguish between this product and the cool white LEDs. Seriously, they are in the exact same packaging. I had to go through my spools and label them myself, felt a little ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: Leo Hummel

customer_reviews.title: I love these. I have a large kitchen but it ...
customer_reviews.text: I love these. I have a large kitchen but it doesn't have a lot of natural light. I had an electrician put electric about 3 upper cabinet groups. I love how I flip one switch and have this glow of indirect lighting throughout the kitchen .. I have been using them about a year, no problems, but I have wondered how long they will last. I use them daily. They are still as bright as the day we installed them and very reasonably priced!
customer_reviews.author: Sundown11

customer_reviews.title: Very cool!
customer_reviews.text: Have it glued to the backside of my TV around the entire perimeter. Throws a cool halo against the wall. Just like I envisioned. It. Use a double sided scotch tape to hold it in place. The strip itself is not tacky enough.
customer_reviews.author: GeKo

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and good output, but light is very orange compared to all my other warm lights. Update: the company offered full satisfaction or a refund. I must say that is great customer service. I had already ordered additional lights. I would rate them perfect if the color was more yellow.
customer_reviews.author: Parent

customer_reviews.title: Warm white is very yellow.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something warmer than the white LEDs that I have. These are way too yellow, makes everything dingy and about half the brightness. How can I find the right shade LEDs?
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Pratt

customer_reviews.title: Great value and outstanding look
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product and the price can't be beat. Installing the connector was a challenge if you have to cut more the one time The end points are easy to use but adding the contact points proved challenging. The directions tell you to apply more pressure. That didn't solve it for me. After several try's I did make the connection. I found the connector to wire accessory very helpful to use at corners or to cut the wire and make two termination points for the power I have installed two sets and plan another. Great decoration in book shelves or kitchen cabinet under lighting
customer_reviews.author: James C

customer_reviews.title: Great Backlight.
customer_reviews.text: Doc'd one star because they didn't curve very easily. I put them under an overhang for backlighting and I made several 180 turns to fill the area. Where I did the turns won't stick real well. Overall they have been up for a few months now with no real issues. Do not recommend putting these where you can see the bulbs as the point light is very bright. Great for backlighting something. The power inverter is fairly bulky you'll need a good place to hide it.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy L.

customer_reviews.title: Come With Extras
customer_reviews.text: These are pretty much like the other LED strips available and they work great. What I really like about these Lighting Ever strips is that they come with the power supply connector already in place, they give you an extra power supply connector and two butt connectors with every strip. They also give you a sheet with the Watts per meter, power requirements and the size of power supply you will need. There is one error on the sheet, the 60 LED per meter strip is listed twice leaving out the power requirements for the 120 LED per meter strips.
customer_reviews.author: homealone

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous! Don't buy it!
customer_reviews.text: These lights were blinding, let alone tacky. As soon as we had it plugged in, we could barely see because it was so bright. Immediately, we began smelling a "burnt plastic" smell. I could feel the heat on my hands, and after setting it down for a minute, realized the smell was getting stronger. We turned it off, and we were glad we did because we found the plastic wheel it was wound in had melted. Don't buy this if you want your house to still be standing in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: FALSE ADVERTISING-CAN NOT LINK
customer_reviews.text: The lights are bright and have good adhesion. BUT....YOU CAN NOT LINK THEM. The description says you can. The directions in the box say you can and even shows you how. But when your added/linked lights don’t light up and you call the company they say, “No, you can’t link them”. False advertising and very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: babycakes143

customer_reviews.title: So dissapointed
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for our remodeled kitchen, both under and over cabinets, they looked amazing for 3 weeks...For some reason the lights are now turning yellow. I am so disappointed. Spend the money and buy quality, we have to start over now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 3 units and connected them around my living room just below the ceiling. I have them plugged into a TP-Link smart plug which is paired with my Google Home, so “Turn on the lights” illuminates my studio. PROS: Great color for a cozy environment. I have the daylight color in my closet, but it’s a bit too harsh for my living room. CONS: Only one con, and honestly a user error. As the connected LEDs continue further from the power source, the lights become noticeable dimmer. The final light shines about half as bright as the first light, but overall the room is lit quite well. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: David Prater

customer_reviews.title: fun little light kit
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product, it's easy to install and puts out a lot of light. I used it under a picture rail. I need to come up with a clever way to hide the cable, but overall I'm quite pleased. In case it's not clear from the product description, the box you receive will contain a plastic reel of LEDs, a spare end connector (so if you buy two power supplies, you can get 2 separate strands of lights from this reel by simply cutting on the marked lines), and 2 connectors for splicing two cut pieces of strip together. The power supplies are sold separately.
customer_reviews.author: Renee B

customer_reviews.title: Not Very Warm, At All
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for under cabinet lighting, and I don't know if I got a bad batch or what... But they are DEFINITELY not very warm. They feel muck closer to 4000k, when I was hoping for 2700-3000. Do not buy if you are expecting warm light. I've now got two wasted rolls that I cannot return, and I'm out the cost.
customer_reviews.author: bward

customer_reviews.title: Really pleased!
customer_reviews.text: I love these! I wanted light above my kitchen cabinets and had tried rope lights. They were awful because you had to install plastic ties to get it to lay flat. These, though? They lay perfectly flat and have stick backing, so you just peel and stick them like stickers. The color is warm and bright. Note that you need to buy a power adapter to go with them. I also bought a remote control adapter. I'm very happy with my purchase and am already looking around my house to see where I can put more of them!
customer_reviews.author: HereComesTheSun

customer_reviews.title: Worked great, gives of nice daylight light.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. S Used these to replace the fluorescent tubes in a ceiling fixture. Was able to fit six runs in the fixture without cutting. Great light output. Daylight color which is what I wanted. Hardest part of whole thing was drilling out the rivers that held old light fixtures in.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Use them in your closets
customer_reviews.text: I lined every closet in my house and I bought the motion sensor separately it’s so nice you open the closet door and Bam the light comes on
customer_reviews.author: John G.

customer_reviews.title: Love these! We put them along the work bench ...
customer_reviews.text: Love these! We put them along the work bench in the garage to create fun hangout in the evening! We were worried about the quality of the adhesive backing --- but once we opened them up and started applying them there were no worries at all. They are super sticky. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: casey bean

customer_reviews.title: I am so happy with these!
customer_reviews.text: this is becoming an addiction. UBER cheap, UBER awesome. I have lighted my closets, underneath the kids beds (think: LANDSPEEDER GLOW!! AWESOME-SAUCE!), lining the stairs, inside our china hutch, around built-in bookshelves..... I am VERY happy with these. Bright, solid 3M adhesive backing, and priced to move! I think I am on my 4th roll of these.... the colored LEDs are just as cool!! You don't want to look at them straight on, so I use 1/2 inch corner moulding to mount them on, then attach to my "desired to be lighted" areas.
customer_reviews.author: Calvin

customer_reviews.title: Right price. Tape doesn't stick well.
customer_reviews.text: Four stars only because the tape doesn't stick well when hanging under cabinet for lighting up counters. Had to add super glue and plastic staples so often. I've purchased pricier brands from the orange big box store and those also say 3M. Those stayed down perfectly. These must come from China and probably aren't really 3M tape. Cheap though! Right price. The above mention is fine for price. Just wish I didn't have to tinker to figure it out.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: LEDs under cabinets.
customer_reviews.text: I used these for under cabinet lighting in the kitchen. I love LED strips and these are as good as any I have used. I did find it hard to get solder to stick to the contacts on the strip. I would suggest using the connectors as solder joints did break on me and it is a pain to solder upside down. Solder doesn't like to flow up. I would suggest something with a higher density of LEDs for anything where you are lighting a larger area, but these are the perfect brightness for under cabinet or under shelf lighting.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Great under cabinet lights
customer_reviews.text: Installed this as under cabinet lighting in my kitchen and an very very happy with it. I had several existing lights put in by the builder, this replaced them all, and I was even able to add it in front of the sink where there was no light before. It might be just a bit too bright, so I may put in a dimmer switch.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Richards

customer_reviews.title: They work well and look good however connectors are finicky
customer_reviews.text: They work well and look good however connectors are finicky. When connecting two strands together where you have cut one to fit a given location it is a real pain in the neck to get the entire strand to work. Ended up using soldering iron to resolve. When connecting two full strands end to end they work fine. I think the real issue are the connectors not the light strips.
customer_reviews.author: David H.

customer_reviews.title: NOT Warm color temperature!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to work with, very bright, great price BUT... This is not even close to what I would call warm color. It has a very greenish hue. Sad, because if the color were correct it would be fantastic!!
customer_reviews.author: Food Network Trained...

customer_reviews.title: These are awesome. I hooked them up for under my top ...
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome. I hooked them up for under my top cupboards and it's awesome. No more shadows blocking me when I'm trying to work at the counter! Yay! I got the power supply with it, also a wireless dongle thing that has a remote. My only complaint is that the dongle has to be LOS but that's a different review! As for the lights, they're spot on! The tape on the back is 3M and quality. I'm very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Desere'

customer_reviews.title: Pleased!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time and worked perfectly for the project intended. They're fairly bright, even for a warm glow, so keep that in mind for your lighting needs. I used them to accent a decorative tree wall hanging. They were easy to cut and apply. I'm very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Lights with a Catch
customer_reviews.text: Granddaughter wanted these for Christmas and put them up instantly! The only dislike was, we had to buy an additional item to make them work!
customer_reviews.author: Karma

customer_reviews.title: Lights are great, connectors are terrible
customer_reviews.text: The lights work wonderfully. Good color and consistency throughout the strip, though color between two strips was noticeably different. Two stars knocked off because of the poor plastic connectors. If you cut the strip you need to use the included connectors to add a power connector or splice on another strip. For the two rolls I purchased, both power connectors were wired incorrectly. They also would not securely clip onto the strip, causing the lights to flicker. Splicing the two strips together also resulted in flickering. An hour with a pair of pliers and some plastic shims fixed the issue, but if you need to connect these strips I would recommend soldering instead.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the lighting. Adds the subtle lighting we wanted in our bathroom. Hooked it up to a motion sensor from a previous kit (BASON 2MSC105W) and it worked perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: v-zeee

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money!
customer_reviews.text: My LED strip has already started to malfunction, sections of the LEDs are not turning on anymore. They are installed above the cabinets so they are not subject to any mechanical damage. They claim to last 50,000 hrs! These have probably lasted less than 4000hrs.
customer_reviews.author: Graham Bagshaw

customer_reviews.title: Very Bright light strip
customer_reviews.text: I used these LEDs to light up my Prusa 3D printer that I put in a plexiglass enclosure. They are very easy to use and does a great job lighting up the printer, making is easy to inspect the printing process.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur F. Lange

customer_reviews.title: A very good value for and works well
customer_reviews.text: A very good value for and works well. The warm white is perfect for back lighting on my RV slide out, plus with the dimmer I bought, it is very nice and so useful. You have light without it blasting you; it works well while watching TV or when just a little light is needed (with the dimmer). I half the strip just above the seal on the inside wall (to be clear), so the actual LED elements don't show but throw light up onto the ceiling.
customer_reviews.author: ItsAllAboutTime

customer_reviews.title: If you want to be able to dim lights like this, better ask first
customer_reviews.text: If you want to be able to dim lights like this, better ask first, I did not...now I have these tape lights, a very expensive dim able light switch, I can't use......these are VERY bright, even though it is stated warm white.. does not look like a warm light!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: judy zappettini/beaver

customer_reviews.title: Connector Does Not Even Line Up
customer_reviews.text: Amazon needs to do some quality assurance on their products. This item got lots of great reviews. It would not work out of the box as the power source and adapter do not even not line up at all. Waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Barbara E

customer_reviews.title: Easy, quick, and wonderful price.
customer_reviews.text: I recently used this for the first time to light my grandmother's display case. It is so quick and easy to use. It took us 5 minutes to install it (including the drilling of holes for cords). The light it puts out is very bright and clean, as well. It works with a simple 12V power adapter, so final cost for lighting the case was around $10. The only reason I'm not going to buy this again is the company offers RGB and waterproof variants for very little more.
customer_reviews.author: Cody Turner

customer_reviews.title: Let there be light!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to have some light in my closet. Its so amazing, I can actually see my clothes now! For such a tiny light source they really put out a bunch of light. I live in an apartment to I did not want to tape them to the wall. I got some of the small, clear Command hooks and placed them every couple feet or so, then just placed the lights on the hooks. I would definitely buy this product again, maybe even try some of the other fun colors.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Soooo pretty
customer_reviews.text: As a 17 year old girl (I share this account with my dad) I had no problem setting this up in my bedroom. It's very pretty. BEFORE YOU BUY. Check out the reviews on the blue version of this. This one guy went into very specific details on what you'll need I will buy more to cover my room. Does anyone know if I can link all of them to one adapter or if I need more than 1?
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Works great!!
customer_reviews.text: Loved this!!! This one went above my kitchen cabinets and ordered another one for my living room.
customer_reviews.author: Babs

customer_reviews.title: Best led's for the money
customer_reviews.text: I have used them with power bricks or solar cells and they are one of the best and cheapest lighting solutions to any direct or indirect design application
customer_reviews.author: Robert S. Drake

customer_reviews.title: Great lights
customer_reviews.text: Awesome lights. I have a remote cabin and after sunset, it was like a cave in there. A propane lantern can only do so much. I bought these, strung them up at ceiling height, hooked them up to a battery and voila! Enough light to do anything you might want to do including read. Very happy with these.
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: Good light for the price
customer_reviews.text: The remote allows you to change both color and intensity for whatever your application. Mine was used to line a gun safe which gives great light to the normally dark area
customer_reviews.author: SMK

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased. Super easy installation and they provide good light
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased. Super easy installation and they provide good light. The cons are that they are too bright for under cabinet lighting, and trying to use the connector pieces can be frustrating. For the price though, I'd recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Al Capone

customer_reviews.title: Perfect LED Strip Lights
customer_reviews.text: These work exactly as described and there's a nice warm white light. At this price was not to like? Just be sure to purchase a power adapter.
customer_reviews.author: DP

customer_reviews.title: These are great. Very bright though
customer_reviews.text: These are great. Very bright though, I was looking for a more accent lighting for under my cabinets. The strip is very flexible and sticks to wood. Just know you have to buy the adapter for it bc it does not come with it( part to plug into wall). But for the price I love them.
customer_reviews.author: doublediamon

customer_reviews.title: Not right length, and no connector.
customer_reviews.text: Not right length, and there was no female or male connector!!!! I ordered a few of these and now I question the quality. 3 were fine, one was not. Had to use a connection from other vendor and length was only sbout 8ft, not 16ft.
customer_reviews.author: Taylorbomb

customer_reviews.title: Worked as expected!
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for my custom awning lights.... The self adhesive tape works pretty well as long as the surface your sticking them too is prepped and clean . 1 set of these I bought wasn't the same as the other which was weird but whatever !
customer_reviews.author: Evodave

customer_reviews.title: Great light
customer_reviews.text: 2 years and has been working perfectly with constant use.
customer_reviews.author: Mike.N

product_meta.title: LE 12V LED Strip Light, Flexible, SMD 2835, 300 LEDs, 16.4ft Tape Light for Home, Kitchen, Party, Christmas and More, Non-Waterproof, Warm White, Pack of 2(Not Include Power Adapter)
feature_bullets: Pack of 2 Units. High brightness and low power consumption: 92lm/ ft,1.5W/ft.
Easy Installation. Come with self-adhesive backing for easy and safe application.
A power adapter is required but NOT INCLUDED, please search 'B019Q3U72M' on Amazon if you need one.

Safe to use. The working voltage is 12V DC. Please do not use power adapter that is higher than 12V to supply. It is touchable and safe to children. The wattage is 18W, Please be kindly informed that the total wattage of LED strip lights should not exceed the max wattage of power adaptor.
Cuttable and connectable. Can be cut and reconnected every 3 LEDs ( 2 inches), without damaging the rest strips.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars2,113 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
